songs.title: It B Da Wild Siberian Tiger Style
songs.lyrics:
Style hella furious
Wild Siberian tiger-style cypher rap
Pack it up, pack it in
Let me begin again
Shout like begin again
Sure, don't mind if I do
Oh yea, I be the real hip hop rap spitter
Ferocious with it
The spit kicker, check, one, two
Twenty dollar freestyle
That's a steal, catch a deal
And I'm waitin' on a re-up
B-Vibe, Rock Steady
Shootin' Booty-Boo [op?]
Scoop guap like doowop
Squaw haiku hop
Do not rewrite your socks, take your shoes off
Step on stage, [?] too much, it's a [?]
Spit Dum Shiny freestyle with no nuance
Haters gonna hate, I let 'em stew like goulash
Underground king, nah, you watch
If you tryin' to battle then you lost
Bars too stupid, I'm the true boss, yaw
I'm in the game deep like scuba
